short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The universal app for all International Medcom Inc. instruments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IMI Gateway lets you connect your International Medcom Inc. Geiger counters to your computer, visualize and record their data.

You can also use IMI Gateway to automatically upgrade the firmware of Medcom instruments that support that capability.

The Medcom instruments supported by IMI Gateway are:

- Medcom Onyx
- Medcom Blue Onyx
- Medcom  RadAlert and Inspector through the use of the Geiger Link USB adapter
